pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains several scenes with visual depictions of nudity, sexual situations, and the use of profanity.
